articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the command of KPA Unit 851 on April 25 to congratulate the servicepersons on the 77th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 He was greeted on the spot by commanding officers of the unit.
					
					 Acknowledging the enthusiastic cheers of the servicepersons of the unit, he warmly congratulated them on the 77th birthday of the KPA.
					
					 He looked back with deep emotion on the glorious path covered by the unit, noting that the servicepersons of the unit are demonstrating its might still today in the sacred struggle to defend the country,  carrying forward its shining tradition.
					
					 Noting that the colors of the unit which shine with victories and glory are associated with the noble soul of the revolutionary forerunners who dedicated their youth and lives to the party and leader, the country and people, he highly estimated the heroic feats performed by them, leaving distinguished  traces in the history of the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 After acquainting himself with the unit's performance of duty and training, he learned in detail about the service and living of the servicepersons.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that all the servicepersons of the unit have grown to be a-match-for-a-hundred fighters with strong combat capability and a high level of combat technique through the intensified training and have carried out their guard duties in a responsible manner, following the moves of the enemies for aggression with a high degree of  vigilance,  he advanced important tasks which would serve as guidelines for bolstering the KPA into invincible revolutionary forces.
					
					 He had a photo session with the servicepersons of the unit.
					
					 He was accompanied by Vice Marshal of the KPA Kim Yong Chun , minister of the People's Armed Forces, General of the KPA Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers.
					
					 Also accompanying him were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il, first vice-department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the State Merited Chorus on April 25 on the occasion of the 77th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 Put on the stage were male choruses "Song Devoted to Marshal     Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Korean People's Army", male solo and male chorus "Where Are You, Dear General", female solo and male chorus "Nobody Knows", male solo and male chorus "For the Motherland", orchestra and male chorus "Mungyong Pass", male chorus "We Will Defend the Leadership of the Revolution at the Cost of Our Lives" and other numbers.
					
					The performers sang high praises of the shinning path of victory and glory covered by the heroic KPA and truthfully represented the iron faith and invincible will of the army and the people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started in the forest of Mt. Paektu.  
					
					 Kim Jong Il highly appreciated the successful performance given by the artistes of the State Merited Chorus, expressing his great satisfaction over the fact that they gave a splendid performance replete with the spirit of the era and the revolutionary soldier spirit. 
					
					He expressed expectation and belief that all the creators and artistes of the State Merited Chorus would conduct brisk revolutionary and militant art activities to encourage the army and the people of the DPRK in the gigantic drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk, Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su and Kim Won Hong and other commanding officers of the army and Secretary Kim Ki Nam, department directors Jang Song Thaek, Pak Nam Gi, Choe Ik Gyu and Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to New Greenhouse at Wonsan University of Agriculture
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to New Greenhouse at Wonsan University of Agriculture
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the newly built soil-type pollution-free greenhouse at Wonsan University of Agriculture.
					 This ultra-modern greenhouse where all aspects of management and operation including the regulation of light, temperature and humidity are automatically controlled is a gift given by him to the teaching staff and students of the university out of his loving care. 
					
					 He looked round the inside and outside of the greenhouse to learn in detail about its construction and use. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that soldier builders successfully constructed the highly automated modern greenhouse in a brief span of time and highly appreciated their feats.
					
					 He underscored the need to conduct brisk researches into the cultivation of crops in the greenhouse and indicated the tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 Walking the compound of the university getting thick with fresh verdure, he learned in detail about the work to turn the area around it into greenery and thick woodland.
					
					 He said that the proud appearance of the university which set a good example in the above-said work is the fruition of noble patriotism fully displayed by its teachers and students for years, calling on all units including universities to follow this example.
					
					 Wonsan University of Agriculture has an important role to play in the development of the nation's agriculture, he said, setting forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for teaching and education and scientific researches.
					
					  Thanks to the energetic endeavors made by the university to implement the theses on the socialist education authored by President Kim Il Sung, Juche has been firmly established in education and its quality improved and its material and technical foundation consolidated, he noted, stressing that these shining achievements made in education are associated with all the unknown efforts made by the educators for the education of the younger generation.
					
					  Noting that the university has a heavy task to put the education and the training of agro-technicians and experts on a higher level to meet the fresh requirements of the Korean revolution, he underscored the need to train students in such a way as to help them make a better contribution to the nation's scientific and technological development and the socialist economic construction.
					
					 In order to bring about a new turn in training agro-technicians it is necessary to consolidate the scientific research centers including greenhouses, conduct research work under a long-term plan and pay deep attention to the work and life of the teaching staff and the students, he stressed.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Togo
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Togo
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on April 23 sent a message of greetings to Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, President of Togo, on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of its independence.
					Kim in the message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the future, too, and sincerely wished the President greater success in his responsible work for the political stability, national unity and the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Sierra Leone
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Sierra Leone
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Saturday sent a message of greetings to Ernest Bai Koroma, President of Sierra Leone, on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of its independence. 
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the President greater success in his work for the peace and stability of the country and its economic reconstruction.

articles.title: Greetings to President of South Africa
articles.content:
Greetings to President of South Africa
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Saturday sent a message of greetings to Kgalema Motlanthe, President of South Africa, on the occasion of the "Day of Freedom" of South Africa.
					 Kim in the message said that over the last 15 years since the apartheid was abolished in South Africa, the government and people of South Africa have made great successes in their efforts for the country's stability and national unity and the socio-economic development. 
					
					He wished the President and the government of South Africa greater successes in the work for the country's prosperity and the people's well-being and regional peace and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: World Day of Intellectual Property Observed
articles.content:
World Intellectual Property Day Observed
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government will as ever increase its efforts to protect the intellectual property and develop it in cooperation with the World Intellectual Property Organization.
					 Minju Joson Sunday says this in a signed article dedicated to the "World Intellectual Property Day".
					
					 It continues:
					
					 The 35th General Assembly of WIPO held in 2000 set April 26 as the "World Intellectual Property Day." This day is marked with diverse events every year. 
					
					 The organization set it as its main duty for this year to conduct the work for invention and creation in the environmental field including the issue of decreasing the emission of carbon dioxide.
					
					 The rapid development of the society resulting from the growth of the information industry and intellectual economy essentially requires the legal protection of human intellectual creations.
					
					 The DPRK, a member nation of the above-said organization, has the articles on the legal protection of copyright and the right to invention and patent right clearly stipulated in its Constitution. The contents of the intellectual property to be legally protected and the measures to prevent the infringement upon the intellectual property, etc. are clarified in detail in the laws and regulations of the DPRK on this basis.
					
					 The intellectual creations of all the working people are under strict legal protection thanks to the well-regulated system of protecting the intellectual property and they are fully displaying their creative ingenuity and artistic talents in the scientific pursuits and literary and art activities.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Escalate Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Escalate Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen Flayed
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, south Korean ultra right-wing conservative organizations complained to the prosecution about Sin Hae Chol, who posted an article on an internet homepage in praise of the successful launch Kwangmyongsong-2 on the charge of violating the "National Security Law (NSL)". 
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a hysteric row kicked up by those hell-bent on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 As already known to the world, it is quite natural that singer Sin posted an article titled "Congratulations" on his internet homepage at a time when compatriots at home and abroad have sincerely rejoiced over the DPRK's successful satellite launch.
					
					 What the above-said organizations did can be done only by those who have wicked disposition of categorically opposing anything done by compatriots. 
					
					 It is needless to say that the Lee Myung Bak group was behind the above-said organizations. As a matter of fact, the prosecution instructed the "first department of the security" to handle this case, as if it had been waiting for the above-said action. 
					
					  The Lee group has cracked down upon anyone desirous of the reconciliation and unity of the nation and the country's reunification on charges of violation of the treacherous and anti-reunification "NSL" and turned south Korea into a graveyard of human rights where elementary freedom of the speech is suppressed by mobilizing all the ultra right-wing conservative organizations, prosecution, the "Grand National Party" and conservative media. 
					
					 It will be as clear as noonday that the south Korean people will have to suffer more unbearable misfortune and pain than now if the Lee group's fascist suppression is overlooked.
					
					 It is possible to achieve the independence and democracy of the south Korean society and the country's reunification, peace and prosperity, the desire of the nation, only when the group of the traitors are kicked out to the U.S. and Japan, their masters.

articles.title: Successful Satellite Launch Hailed
articles.content:
Successful Satellite Launch Hailed
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 precisely means the victory of the might of the DPRK's ideology and mental power, will and pluck and self-supporting economy and science and technology.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Many countries have their satellites but they put them into orbit in various ways.
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in launching the satellite entirely with its own technology and by its own efforts. This serves as a clear example for the countries and nations desirous of independence to follow in developing outer space.
					
					 It has become a world trend to study and develop space. If a country fails to pay attention to this trend and neglects space development based on the cutting-edge science and technology, it will find itself controlled and subjugated by the imperialists scientifically and technologically and will be dependent on them in the end. 
					
					 When the DPRK released a report on the projected satellite launch, the imperialists and their followers left no stone unturned to hold the DPRK's plan in check.
					
					 They made so much fuss about the projected satellite launch because its successful launch means a victory of sovereign DPRK in the standoff with the forces hostile to it.
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in launching the satellite by its own efforts and technology at one go but the U.S. and Japan have the precedents of failures.
					
					 Their desperate efforts can be explained by the fact that the  DPRK's successful satellite launch might remind the world of their setbacks in the past and offer an opportunity of declaring before it their defeat in the political and scientific and technological confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK's successful satellite launch, its victory, have inspired the world progressive people and exerted great influence on the world political structure and the development of the situation. 
					
					 The DPRK's satellite Kwangmyongsong-2, a  satellite of independence, satellite of victory, will fully demonstrate the dignity and might of Songun Korea throughout our planet, turning round the earth in its orbit non-stop to creditably perform its mission.

articles.title: Display of Korean Nation-First Spirit Called for
articles.content:
Display of Korean Nation-First Spirit Called for
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation- first spirit serves as thoughts and feelings of all Koreans and a common ideological and moral weapon for achieving national sovereignty. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed article:
					
					 The above-said spirit reflects strong self-respect that one's nation is not inferior to others and the advantages of the nation and the noble patriotic will to preserve and glorify everything national.
					
					 Only when all the compatriots fully display the Korean nation-first spirit, confident of the advantages of the nation, it is possible to terminate outside forces' domination and interference in south Korea and achieve national sovereignty nationwide.
					
					 The U.S., while paying lip-service to the "peaceful settlement" of the nuclear issue, is working hard to provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK through a preemptive nuclear attack behind the scene. These moves have reached their height.  Its brigandish aim is to occupy the whole of Korea by force of arms and play with the destines of all the Koreans. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. seeks to execute its policy of domination over south Korea and its hostile policy toward the DPRK with the help of the south Korean authorities while the clique of traitors is working hard to do harm to fellow countrymen and realize its ambition to achieve "unification under the liberal democratic system," backed by the U.S. 
					
					 It is unbearable shame on the nation to allow outside forces to mercilessly violate its sovereignty as it values its dignity and honor as its life and soul. 
					
					 The Korean nation-first spirit serves as a source of strength for the Koreans to defend peace and security of the country and preserve the destiny of the nation from the foreign aggression and interference. 
					
					 Only when all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad advance under the uplifted banner of the said spirit, all aggressor forces and anti-reunification forces will prove impotent and the Korean nation will defend its sovereignty by its own efforts and proudly demonstrate its honor and dignity.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Suppression of Solidarity Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Suppression of Solidarity Blasted
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity of Youth and Students for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea released a statement on April 22 denouncing the puppet authorities for their unreasonable sentence passed on the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said that the Seoul Central District Court held a trial on April 21 at which it labeled the solidarity an "enemy-benefiting organization" and sentenced its leading members to penal servitude.
					
					 It held that the solidarity is a patriotic pro-reunification movement organization which took the lead in the activities to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 It noted that the judicial authorities have cracked down on the patriotic forces on the charge of "benefiting enemy" by invoking the "National Security Law", an anti-reunification law and undemocratic evil law, thereby self-exposing that they have been completely reduced to henchmen serving the dictatorial regime keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen and murder of people. 
					
					 The suppression of pro-reunification patriotic forces steadily intensified by the judicial authorities right after Lee Myung Bak came to power amounts to brutal murder being perpetrated in defiance of the norms of law and justice and without any justification.
					
					 It urged the judicial authorities to retract the unreasonable sentence and set free those leading members of the solidarity at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Security Authorities' Suppression Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Security Authorities' Suppression Flailed
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century held a press conference in Seoul on April 22 at which it branded the puppet security authorities' suppression of students as a human rights abuse.
					 At the press conference the organization accused the security authorities of mobilizing police on April 10 to commit such tyrannical acts as walking away to a police station 49 students affiliated to the federation when they were having their hair cut close after holding a press conference in demand of the settlement of the issue of registration fee and the issue of young unemployed on charge of violation of the "law on assembly and demonstration".
					
					 The organization queried how can the students' expression of their  will to have measures for education taken be a violation of the above-said law.
					
					 It urged the "human rights committee" to demand the authorities stop their unreasonable suppression of the progressive forces.

articles.title: Resignation of Anti-Reunification Maniacs Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of Anti-Reunification Maniacs Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- 34 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress and the Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference in Seoul on April 23 at which they demanded the resignation of anti-reunification elements for confrontation.
					 A letter of protest addressed to traitor Lee Myung Bak released at the press conference said that the minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade" and others concerned with diplomacy of the Lee Myung Bak "government" are deceiving the people, taking the lead in agitating south Korea's full participation in the PSI harmful to the south-north relations and the peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak is to entirely blame for this, the letter of protest held that Lee should not postpone or shelve the decision to participate in the PSI but totally retract it. 
					
					 The letter of protest demanded the Lee Myung Bak "government" immediately fire the anti-reunification maniacs who bedeviled the south-north relations and deceived the people.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Marked in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Denmark, Tajikistan and Poland in the period between April 3 and 13 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association noted Kim Il Sung made tireless efforts for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula, adding that his cause of national reunification has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman hailed the DPRK's satellite launch as a scientific and technological achievement made in the Korean people's struggle to fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The secretary of the Sogd Regional Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan said that Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, Songun idea through his brilliant ideological and theoretical activities, indicating the road ahead of progressive humankind.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Il has steadily developed in depth the Songun idea fathered by Kim Il Sung and turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist fortress.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Denmark.

articles.title: Army Day of DPRK Observed in Egypt
articles.content:
Army Day of DPRK Observed in Egypt
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association issued bulletin "Korean People's Army, guardian of justice and peace" on April 21 on the occasion of the 77th founding anniversary of the KPA.
					 Referring to the fact that the justice and peace of the world are facing a serious challenge due to the imperialists' evermore undisguised high-handed acts and moves for hegemony in the new century, the bulletin in its article noted that progressive humankind is looking up to the KPA which has stood up against the policy of strength of the U.S. styling itself the "world's only super power" with its powerful war deterrent and arms of justice.
					
					 Having the KPA, the DPRK is wining victory after victory in the political and military confrontation with the U.S. and peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia is being firmly guaranteed, the bulletin said, and continued:
					
					 The Songun politics is recognized by the international community as a transparent political mode of protecting independence from imperialism and the KPA, a standard bearer of the Songun politics, is praised as a guardian of justice and peace.
